onboarding_installBlueTotpApp.message: Install the Blue TOTP app on your smartphone. Scan this QR code:

setup_webservice_qrNotFound.message: You didn't find a QR code?

setup_finished_appAndExtensionMustBeConn.message: Blue TOTP only works, when smartphone app and browser extension are connected via Bluetooth.

setup_finished_hintKeepBluetoothActivate.message: Hint: keep Bluetooth always enabled on your smartphone and PC, for a better user experience.
